title: Customer Success Story
scriptBeat: Customer: "Y'all, I've been waiting for THIS my whole life!"
Customer: "I'm a veteran with chronic pain. Texas finally became the 40th state for medical cannabis in 2025. Game changer!"
Liv Hana: "That's what we're here for. Legal, tested, compliant - Texas taking care of Texans."
Jesse: "From brick weed to premium flower. This is OUR revolution!"
cta: Share your Texas cannabis story with us! #TexasTHCTales
easterEgg: References Texas HB 46 making Texas 40th state for medical cannabis May 2025
